# Analisis Exploratorio

## Analisis univariado

Importamos la librerias necesarias
```{r}
library(pacman)
p_load(stringi, tidyverse,  readr)
source('../lib/data-access.R')
```


Veamos las distribuciones de cada variable num√©rica:

### Danceability

```{r fig1, fig.height = 6, fig.width = 8, fig.align = "center", include = TRUE}
plot_hist_collection(
  collection_name = 'hist_top_10_danceability',
  name            = 'Danceability',
  binwidth        = 0.05
)
```
